fields.name: Detect
fields.desc: The aboleth makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

fields.name: Psychic Drain
fields.desc: One creature charmed by the aboleth takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

fields.name: Tail Swipe
fields.desc: The aboleth makes one tail attack.

fields.name: Detect
fields.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

fields.name: Tail Attack
fields.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.

fields.name: Wing Attack
fields.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 ft. of the dragon must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

fields.name: Detect
fields.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

fields.name: Tail Attack
fields.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.

fields.name: Wing Attack
fields.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 ft. of the dragon must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (2d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

fields.name: Detect
fields.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

fields.name: Detect
fields.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

fields.name: Cast a Spell
fields.desc: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

fields.name: Claw Attack
fields.desc: The sphinx makes one claw attack.

fields.name: Teleport
fields.desc: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

fields.name: Parry
fields.desc: The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

fields.name: Split
fields.desc: When a pudding that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new puddings if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new pudding has hit points equal to half the original pudding's, rounded down. New puddings are one size smaller than the original pudding.

fields.name: Unnerving Mask
fields.desc: When a creature the devil can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the devil, the devil can create the illusion that it looks like one of the creature's departed loved ones or bitter enemies. If the creature can see the devil, it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its turn.

fields.name: Hand Crossbow
fields.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

fields.name: Shortsword
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

fields.name: Parry
fields.desc: The erinyes adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the erinyes must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

fields.name: Parry
fields.desc: The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gladiator must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

fields.name: Poisoned Dart
fields.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

fields.name: War Pick
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

fields.name: Cast a Spell
fields.desc: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

fields.name: Claw Attack
fields.desc: The sphinx makes one claw attack.

fields.name: Teleport
fields.desc: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

fields.name: Parry
fields.desc: The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

fields.name: Ink Cloud
fields.desc: While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 60-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.

fields.name: Lightning Storm
fields.desc: The kraken uses Lightning Storm.

fields.name: Tentacle Attack or Fling
fields.desc: The kraken makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.

fields.name: Cantrip
fields.desc: The lich casts a cantrip.

fields.name: Disrupt Life
fields.desc: Each non-undead creature within 20 feet of the lich must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 (6d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

fields.name: Frightening Gaze
fields.desc: The lich fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lich's gaze for the next 24 hours.

fields.name: Paralyzing Touch
fields.desc: The lich uses its Paralyzing Touch.

fields.name: Parry
fields.desc: The marilith adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the marilith must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

fields.name: Attack
fields.desc: The mummy lord makes one attack with its rotting fist or uses its Dreadful Glare.

fields.name: Blasphemous Word
fields.desc: The mummy lord utters a blasphemous word. Each non-undead creature within 10 feet of the mummy lord that can hear the magical utterance must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the mummy lord's next turn.

fields.name: Blinding Dust
fields.desc: Blinding dust and sand swirls magically around the mummy lord. Each creature within 5 feet of the mummy lord must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of the creature's next turn.

fields.name: Channel Negative Energy
fields.desc: The mummy lord magically unleashes negative energy. Creatures within 60 feet of the mummy lord, including ones behind barriers and around corners, can't regain hit points until the end of the mummy lord's next turn.

fields.name: Whirlwind of Sand
fields.desc: The mummy lord magically transforms into a whirlwind of sand, moves up to 60 feet, and reverts to its normal form. While in whirlwind form, the mummy lord is immune to all damage, and it can't be grappled, petrified, knocked prone, restrained, or stunned. Equipment worn or carried by the mummy lord remain in its possession.

fields.name: Parry
fields.desc: The noble adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

fields.name: Split
fields.desc: When a jelly that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new jellies if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new jelly has hit points equal to half the original jelly's, rounded down. New jellies are one size smaller than the original jelly.

fields.name: Shield
fields.desc: When a creature makes an attack against the wearer of the guardian's amulet, the guardian grants a +2 bonus to the wearer's AC if the guardian is within 5 feet of the wearer.

fields.name: Blinding Gaze
fields.desc: The solar targets one creature it can see within 30 ft. of it. If the target can see it, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until magic such as the lesser restoration spell removes the blindness.

fields.name: Searing Burst
fields.desc: The solar emits magical, divine energy. Each creature of its choice in a 10 -foot radius must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

fields.name: Teleport
fields.desc: The solar magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see.

fields.name: Rock Catching
fields.desc: If a rock or similar object is hurled at the giant, the giant can, with a successful DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, catch the missile and take no bludgeoning damage from it.

fields.name: Attack
fields.desc: The tarrasque makes one claw attack or tail attack.

fields.name: Chomp
fields.desc: The tarrasque makes one bite attack or uses its Swallow.

fields.name: Move
fields.desc: The tarrasque moves up to half its speed.

fields.name: Heal Self
fields.desc: The unicorn magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points.

fields.name: Hooves
fields.desc: The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.

fields.name: Shimmering Shield
fields.desc: The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 ft. of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: The vampire makes one bite attack.

fields.name: Move
fields.desc: The vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

fields.name: Unarmed Strike
fields.desc: The vampire makes one unarmed strike.
